summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.71.004, 23.71.008, 23.71.014, 23.71.020, 23.71.038, 23.71.044, 23.76.004 (Exhibit A), 23.76.006 and 23.76.026; and repealing Sections 23.71.024, 23.71.026, 23.71.028, and 23.71.029; all relating to the Northgate Overlay District.
